entry.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - VMware vCenter Server upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 22, 06:00 UTC  -  Apr 28, 16:00 UTC

Apr 16, 22:02 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Vmware offer.

Start time : 22/04/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 26/04/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for VMware vCenter Server services. An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [BHS][VMware] - Management console
entry.content:
Apr 5, 15:28 UTC
Resolved - Start time: 05/04/2024 13:42 UTC
End time: 05/04/2024 15:22 UTC
User impact : Services are working as they should be.
Root cause It was due to a malfunction on a hardware.

Apr 5, 14:58 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Apr 5, 14:57 UTC
Investigating - Following all the necessary information.

Start time: 05/04/2024 13:42 UTC
User impact : Customers do not have access to their management console.
However access on their VMs remain accessible .
Ongoing Actions:Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Thank you for your understanding

OVHcloud Technical team
